title: Please grant permissions.
summary: The following permissions are required for smooth game play.

list.name: Storage
list.desc: We need your permission to access photos, media, files and external storage for game settings, cache storage and 1:1 inquiry handling.

list.name: Contacts
list.desc: This permission is needed for push notifications. Your address book feature will not be affected.

list.name: Phone
list.desc: This permission is needed to access your phone to check the device identifier to prevent abusing and process statistics. We will not collect your phone number or call you.

list.name: Microphone
list.desc: Don't worry, your microphone feature will not be affected. This permission is needed for content using the microphone in the game.

list.name: Camera
list.desc: This permission is needed for content using the camera in the game. Your camera feature will not be affected.

list.name: Location
list.desc: This permission is needed for content using device location information in the game. Your location information will not be affected.

list.name: SMS
list.desc: This permission is needed to enter the verification code automatically from the verification SMS. Your SMS sending feature will not be affected.

list.name: Calendar
list.desc: This permission is needed to check the schedule in the calendar or enter a new event. Your calendar feature will not be affected.

list.name: Bio Sensor
list.desc: This permission is needed for fingerprint recognition for payment transactions. Your Bio Sensor feature will not be affected.
